name: wan-video-animation
title: Image to Video Animation with Wan
description: Animate static images into smooth videos using the Wan video generation model.
extendedDescription: Bring your images to life with this Wan-powered animation workflow. Upload any static image and watch it transform into a smooth, natural-looking video. The Wan model excels at understanding motion dynamics and produces fluid animations that maintain the visual quality of your source image. Perfect for social media content, presentations, and creative projects.
howToUse: Upload your source image to the Load Image node
Describe the desired motion in the prompt (e.g., 'gentle wind blowing hair')
Queue the workflow and wait for video generation
metaDescription: Create smooth video animations from static images with Wan in ComfyUI. Free workflow template for image-to-video generation.

faqItems.question: What image formats are supported?
faqItems.answer: PNG, JPEG, and WebP are fully supported. For best results, use high-resolution images.

faqItems.question: How much VRAM is required?
faqItems.answer: Wan video generation requires at least 12GB VRAM. 24GB is recommended for longer videos.
